Rulings.Tengu:
●Blast Juggler targets 2 face-up monsters with 1000 or less ATK.
●Blast Juggler's effect cannot be activated if there is only 1 face-up monster (excluding Blast Juggler) with 1000 or less ATK.
Rulings.Goat: “Blast Juggler” does not count itself for the number of eligible monsters with an ATK of 1000 or less.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Blast Juggler" targets 2 face-up monsters with 1000 or less ATK.\n2. The effect of "Blast Juggler" cannot be activated if there is only 1 face-up monster (excluding "Blast Juggler") with 1000 or less ATK.
